notesStmt.note: Slightly imperfect at the end. Stained.
Folio 1r contains an Arabic-Hebrew record relating to a transaction concerning this manuscript, signed by three witnesses, Zekharya ben Se'adya, Zekharya ben Shelomoh and Shelomoh ben Se'adya.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

collation.p: 24 full quires of 10 leaves each plus a part of one incomplete quire at the end. Quires signed on the last and the first page.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Yemenite semi-cursive script of the 16th century.
